title: ShopNext - E-commerce Hub
description: A high-performance e-commerce platform with Stripe integration, server-side rendering, and a headless CMS backend.

title: FinTrack - Personal Finance Dashboard
description: A real-time finance tracker that visualizes spending habits using interactive charts and automated transaction syncing.

title: TaskFlow - Agile Board
description: A Kanban-style project management tool featuring drag-and-drop tasks, real-time collaboration via WebSockets, and team workspaces.

title: HealthPulse - Telemedicine Portal
description: A secure healthcare platform allowing patients to book appointments, consult with doctors via video calls, and manage digital prescriptions.

title: DevConnect - Social Network for Coders
description: A community-driven platform for developers to share code snippets, ask questions, and follow technical influencers.

title: SecurePass - Password Manager
description: A desktop-first encrypted vault for managing passwords, featuring AES-256 encryption and multi-factor authentication.
